name: intercede
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to use your influence to persuade someone in authority to forgive another person, or save this person from punishment: intercede with Several religious leaders have interceded with the authorities on behalf of the condemned prisoner. Synonyms
arbitrate
mediate

Urging & persuading
Add to word list
Add to word list
to use your influence to persuade someone in authority not to punish or harm someone or to do something for someone: Some pharmacists will intercede on your behalf with doctors.
